We accept the following forms of payment for rentals and purchases:

At the Box

1. Debit Cards
2. Credit Cards: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover
3. Redbox Cards
4. MasterPass https://masterpass.com/en-us.html


On Demand

1. Debit Cards
2. Credit Cards: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, or Discover


E-Gift Cards and Promo Codes

1. Credit Cards: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, or Discover

You can use your Redbox E-Gift Card* to reserve movies for pickup at any U.S. location. Here's how:

Activating the E-Gift Card

1. Select on the Activation link in the email.
2. Login to your https://www.redbox.com.
3. Scroll to Payment Methods
4. Select Add Gift Card.
5. Enter the 16-digit card number.
6. Enter the PIN Code.
7. Select Add.

Renting a Movie Using Your E-Gift Card

1. Pick a movie at https://www.redbox.com, or through your mobile app, and add it to your cart. You can select up to two movies.
2. Select Use Saved Redbox Card at checkout and finish the reservation process.
3. When you pick up your movie at the box, you can swipe any valid payment card that's associated with your https://www.redbox.com account.
4. Enjoy the show!

To check your E-Gift Card balance, visit https://www.redbox.com/account/redboxcards.

*E-Gift Cards can only be used to rent DVD and Blu-rayTM discs.
*E-Gift Cards cannot be reloaded with extra funds, simply purchase an additional card instead.
*E-Gift Cards must be associated with your Redbox Online Profile.
*E-Gift Cards must be associated with an accepted form of payment (credit or debit card).

You can purchase a Redbox E-Gift card for yourself or someone else at https://www.redbox.com/gifts. Simply enter the recipients' email address, and they will receive your gift via email.

You can select one or multiple recipients, select a gift card graphic from a range of choices, and write a personalized message. E-Gift card amounts are available from $5 to a maximum of $150.00 in $5 increments. Please note that:

1. Once you've purchased an E-Gift card, you can't add more money to the same card. Instead, simply purchase a new E-Gift card to increase the amount.
2. E-Gift cards are for use on DVDs and Blu-rayâ„¢ discs.
3. E-Gift cards must be associated with a Redbox.com profile.
4. E-Gift cards must be associated with an accepted form of payment.
5. E-Gift cards are non-refundable

If you have problems related to purchasing an E-Gift card, you can contact customer care by visiting https://redbox.custhelp.com/app/chat.

You can purchase Redbox Promo Codes for yourself or someone else at https://www.redbox.com/gifts. Promo codes can be used for 1-day rentals on DVDs, Blu-rayTM discs.. These promo codes don't expire and any extra-day charges are the responsibility of whoever rents the discs.

We sell packages of 5, 10, 20, or 50 promo codes. They're delivered via email, and they can be used at any Redbox location in the United States.

If you want to divide the promo codes among a number of people, select yourself as the recipient and have the promo codes emailed to you. You can send the codes out via email or print them out.

You will receive the promo codes shortly after making the purchase. If you don't receive them right away, it might be delayed due to your email carrier. If you haven't received an email in four hours and you've checked your spam folder, then contact us at https://redbox.custhelp.com/app/chat or call us at 1-866-REDBOX3.

In order to purchase promotional codes or E-Gift cards, the purchaser must have a valid payment card with a mailing address located in one of the fifty U.S. States. Once purchased, the promotional code or E-Gift card can be used at any Box located in Puerto Rico.

We no longer sell physical Redbox cards, but we still accept them at this time.

You can purchase E-Gift Cards or Promo Codes at https://www.redbox.com/gifts.
